author: leif
msg: Up the version and add definitions to the dependencies to make it possible for build tools to tell which jars are needed at runtime.

author: leif
msg: Modify the pool so that Connections always have their AutoCommit status reset before being returned to requesting code.  This is to avoid very hard to track down problems where a component changes the autoCommit status and then returns the connection to the pool without restoring it.  If another component is expecting auto commit behavior but the connection is working in a transaction.

author: djencks
msg: fix build issues: use axis snapshot from apache, use geronimo jaxr in webservices

author: dolander
msg: Rename the Form.scope, Form.name and Form.type to Form.beanScope, Form.beanName

author: geirm
msg: When making a jUDDI ServiceInfo from a JAXR Service,
try to mine out the keyinformation that we do have
